name: The Cakependium
description: This week's game isn't as impressive as my previous Game a Week entries - the theme this week was compendium, and I wanted to make a collection (compendium!) of recipes that I have strong memories of from my childhood. It's a little low on the interactivity element, but I hope you enjoy regardless! And if you bake anything, please tweet me a photo! @magicmagpiegame :)
